Thu Dec 28 03:12:00 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/bin/libassuan-config /opt/bin//libassuan-config
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/include/assuan.h /opt/include//assuan.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//pkgconfig
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.la /opt/lib//libassuan.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so.0.8.6 /opt/lib//libassuan.so.0.8.6
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so /opt/lib//libassuan.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/pkgconfig/libassuan.pc /opt/lib//pkgconfig/libassuan.pc
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/lib/libassuan.so.0 /opt/lib//libassuan.so.0
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//info
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/info/assuan.info /opt/share//info/assuan.info
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/info/dir /opt/share//info/dir
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libassuan-2.5.6/share/aclocal/libassuan.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/libassuan.m4
